You're welcome.

Nice to see the torrent is well shared.  It's truly a masterpiece.  I cannot imagine the book being filmed in a 2-hour movie.

The Los Angeles-based production company Stone Village Pictures and producer Scott Steindorff announced that they will make a screen adaptation of The Master and Margarita.

The New York-based Ira Deutchman Productions also announced the production of The Master and Margarita on the ?In development? section of their website.

By far the best film I have seen in years, faithful to the novel and, I daresay, just as magnetic.   Thank you very, very much. p.s. If you know the director's name please post it.
Director: Vladimir Bortko, of "Banditskiy Peterburg" fame
Thank you soo much for this treasure. I would never even dare dreaming book would be done so well... And it has! You made me so happy :) X
